column1: #Text=The polycrystalline Co3NiNb2O9 was synthesized by the conventional solid-state reaction.
#Text=The stoichiometric amounts of Co3O4, NiO, and Nb2O5 were mixed and well ground, followed by reaction in an alumina crucible at 900 째C for 24 h in air.
#Text=The resultant powder was reground and pressed into pellet under a pressure of 20 MPa and then sintered at 1100 째C for 24 h.
